home.aboutStep1: We distribute dry construction mixes and finishing materials
home.aboutStep2: We work with leading global brands of the construction industry
home.aboutStep3: We provide a full range of construction materials
home.aboutStep4: We guarantee quality and timely delivery of products
home.nearbyTitle: UZCHEM — we are close to you
home.nearbyDesc: We supply construction materials across the entire territory of Uzbekistan
home.partnerStep1Desc: Description of the supplier partnership process
home.partnerStep2Desc: Description of the supply management system
home.partnerSlide1Desc: UZCHEM holds leading positions in the distribution of construction and finishing materials across the Republic of Uzbekistan.
home.partnerSlide2Desc: We act as a reliable supplier of globally recognized brands for retail outlets and construction organizations nationwide.
home.partnerSlide3Desc: Our extensive dealer network ensures uninterrupted deliveries to retail outlets and supply channels in both B2B and B2C segments.
home.partnerSlide4Desc: The UZCHEM team provides high-quality daily service and includes a dedicated claims specialist to resolve issues related to reclamations.
